main.name: James L. Avakian
main.description: Software Developer by Day, Founder, and Freelancer by Night
main.bio: My name is James, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. Currently I'm working at Optical Automation developing applications. I enhance, integrate and support for MEAN, MERN, with MongoDB-Atlas, and MySQL database websites for Web Production. Perform all functions across the entire software development lifecycle: requirements gathering, detailed analysis, design, coding, testing, deployment, and production support. Experience with MEAN Angular, MERN Bootstrap, and VueJS Full Stack front-end ReactJS and NodeJS back- end development for B2B and B2C environments. Able to create api and RESTful Service database access. Strong knowledge of compatibility and cross-browser issues regarding Responsive Web Design for computer and mobile user experience from a web browser. Able to move from quickly from draft mockups into various web languages. Practical knowledge in HTML CSS, and Jquery. Background in supporting the technical needs of sites of high volume websites, apps, and integrations. Hands-on experience with server-side languages - A real passion for the end-to-end solutions that drive the user experience and customer satisfaction.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

education.school: California Polytechnic State University, San Luis Obispo, CA
